basic.description: Students are exposed to health issues associated with military experience which includes both veterans and military families.  As a weekly webinar, the course will include presentations from Canadian subject matter experts who will contextualize military mental and physical health needs and  introduce theoretical and methodological approaches to conducting applied health research among this population.  Three hours weekly, fall; every year.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Issues in Military and Veteran Health Research
